title: What should I do for my IB math exploration? I need a topic as soon as possible. - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for your A2A. I would suggest read my answer to this question: What are some good ideas for a IB HL Math Internal Assessment? Apart from this answer, I would suggest you do some search on the internet regarding possible math IA topics and have a look at some online resources such as: 200 math HL IA topics[1], for a basic idea. Hope this helps! Happy exploring! Footnotes[1] https://www.fairviewhs.org/staff/emily-silverman/classes/ib-math-hl/files/30763
